name: Yuog Software
description: Yuog Software specializes in empowering businesses through cutting-edge WhatsApp Marketing solutions and chatbot development. We design advanced, user-friendly chatbots tailored for WhatsApp Market, enabling brands to engage with customers effortlessly and efficiently. In addition, we offer custom XML feed services to streamline operations and ensure seamless integration with Meta platforms. At Yuog Software, our mission is to help businesses thrive in the digital landscape with innovative and reliable solutions.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Engagement Platform: Specializing in broadcasting automation, and chatbots for enhanced customer engagement and support.
Providing seamless integration of the WhatsApp Cloud API for technology enablers.
Outstanding customer support ensures clients get the help they need to use our solutions effectively.
